ruleset.name: Error Prone
ruleset.description: Rules to detect constructs that are either broken, extremely confusing or prone to runtime errors.

rule.name: EmptyFlowBranchRule
rule.message: Flow service {0} has empty branch at {1}
rule.description: There should be always child elements under Flow Branch.

rule.name: DuplicateFlowBranchesRule
rule.message: Flow service {0} has duplicate label '{1}' under Flow Branch at {2}
rule.description: All child elements under Flow Branch should has different label value.

rule.name: RestoreDebugPipelineRule
rule.message: Service {0} has debug pipeline property set to restore
rule.description: Service debug pipeline property should not be set to restore.

rule.name: DisabledFlowElementRule
rule.message: Flow service {0} has disabled flow step at {1}
rule.description: Makes sure there is no disabled code in flow service.

rule.name: StartupServicesRule
rule.description: Makes sure the startup services exist.

rule.name: ShutdownServicesRule
rule.description: Makes sure the shutdown services exist.
